Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct-dial phone, Radio/Stereo System, Safe box. TV/Video room, Hairdresser.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: On a 500-acre wooded estate along a 10km sandy beach, facing the Ionian islands. Arkoudi - 2km, Gastouni - 15km. Nearest airport: Araxos airport - 60km.
